page.title: 04Bacup and its problems
page.content:
There is a good deal of vandalism in our area. Certain parts of the main town are almost derelict because so many windows have been broken and the buildings are in a bad state. We will be glad when it is done up because it has a bad reputation as the scruffiest place in Bacup. The back of the Leisure Hall has been on fire. Some lads were seen playing about with matches and set fire to it. The local council of Rossendale will have to rebuild most of the roof.
There has been a fight between two families. We are not allowed to name the families so we will call them family A and B. The fight first started when one of family A stabbed one of family B in the back at a local pub. There were running battles in the street.
